tasks.name: Create NotificationProvider interface with event types (thread_complete, batch_complete, error) and playNotification method
tasks.report: Created NotificationProvider interface with NotificationEvent type and playNotification method in src/lib/notifications.ts

tasks.name: Implement MacOSSoundProvider using afplay with default system sounds from /System/Library/Sounds/
tasks.report: Implemented MacOSSoundProvider class using afplay with default system sounds from /System/Library/Sounds/ (Glass.aiff, Hero.aiff, Basso.aiff)

tasks.name: Add configuration loading from ~/.config/agenv/notifications.json for custom sound mappings
tasks.report: Added loadConfig function that reads from ~/.config/agenv/notifications.json with SoundMappings and NotificationConfig interfaces

tasks.name: Create ExternalApiProvider stub interface for future webhook/API integrations
tasks.report: Created ExternalApiProvider stub class with WebhookPayload interface and buildPayload method for future webhook integrations

tasks.name: Write unit tests for notifications.ts with mocked audio playback
tasks.report: Created tests/notifications.test.ts with 30 tests covering loadConfig, MacOSSoundProvider, ExternalApiProvider, NotificationManager, and convenience functions. All tests pass with mocked audio playback.

tasks.name: Define ThreadMetadata interface and ThreadsJson schema in types.ts
tasks.report: Added ThreadMetadata interface and ThreadsJson schema to types.ts

tasks.name: Create ThreadsStore class with CRUD operations (loadThreads, saveThreads, getThreadMetadata, updateThreadMetadata)
tasks.report: Created ThreadsStore with loadThreads, saveThreads, getThreadMetadata, updateThreadMetadata and CRUD operations

tasks.name: Implement file locking using proper-lockfile for concurrent access safety
tasks.report: Implemented file locking with withThreadsLock, updateThreadMetadataLocked, modifyThreads, and session locking functions

tasks.name: Create migrateFromTasksJson utility to move sessions and github issues from tasks.json to threads.json
tasks.report: Created migrateFromTasksJson utility to migrate sessions and github issues, plus validateMigration for verification

tasks.name: Write unit tests for threads.ts including CRUD, migration, and concurrent access tests
tasks.report: Created comprehensive tests for CRUD, sessions, locking, GitHub issues, migration, and concurrent access - all 35 tests pass

tasks.name: Update startTaskSession and startTaskSessionLocked to write to threads.json via ThreadsStore
tasks.report: Updated startTaskSession, startTaskSessionLocked, and startMultipleSessionsLocked to delegate to threads.ts

tasks.name: Update completeTaskSession and completeTaskSessionLocked to write to threads.json
tasks.report: Updated completeTaskSession, completeTaskSessionLocked, and completeMultipleSessionsLocked to delegate to threads.ts

tasks.name: Update getCurrentTaskSession and getTaskSessions to read from threads.json
tasks.report: Updated getCurrentTaskSession and getTaskSessions to read from threads.json via getThreadMetadata. Removed unused withTasksLock function and lockfile import.

tasks.name: Add auto-migration check on load: if sessions exist in tasks.json, migrate them with backup
tasks.report: Added hasSessionsInTasksJson, createTasksJsonBackup, clearSessionsFromTasks, migrateSessionsToThreads functions. Updated readTasksFile to auto-migrate on load.

tasks.name: Mark session fields in Task interface as deprecated, update session-tracking.test.ts
tasks.report: Marked sessions and currentSessionId fields as @deprecated in Task interface. Updated session-tracking.test.ts to verify data goes to threads.json. Added migration tests.

tasks.name: Import notification service in multi.ts and add --silent flag to disable sounds
tasks.report: Added import for playNotification from notifications.ts. Added --silent flag to MultiCliArgs interface, help text, and argument parsing.

tasks.name: Detect thread completion in status polling loop and call playNotification('thread_complete')
tasks.report: Added thread_complete notification call when thread pane exits with code 0. Plays for each completed thread in the child.on(close) callback.

tasks.name: Call playNotification('batch_complete') when all threads in batch complete
tasks.report: Added batch_complete notification after all threads in batch have exited (no running threads). Added 100ms delay to avoid sound overlap with thread sounds.

tasks.name: Call playNotification('error') on thread failure detection
tasks.report: Added error notification when thread fails (non-zero exit code) and in child.on(error) handler for tmux attachment failures.

tasks.name: Add notification integration tests to multi.test.ts with mocked playback
tasks.report: Added comprehensive notification integration tests to multi.test.ts with mocked playNotification. Tests cover: thread completion, thread failure, batch completion, silent mode, and mixed results scenarios. All 15 tests pass.

tasks.name: Debug createGridLayout in tmux.ts - trace split sequence and identify why layout is 1+3 instead of 2x2
tasks.report: Identified pane index shift bug: after vertical split of pane 0, indices shift - pane 1 becomes BL not TR. Step 4 targets wrong pane.

tasks.name: Fix split percentages and target pane selection to produce correct 2x2 grid
tasks.report: Fixed by capturing right pane ID before vertical split (line 354), then using pane ID directly (line 367) instead of index-based targeting which shifts.

tasks.name: Test grid with 1, 2, 3, 4 pane configurations to ensure all work correctly
tasks.report: Verified 1,2,3,4 pane configs all work. 4-pane produces correct 2x2 grid with TL/TR/BL/BR positions.

tasks.name: Add tmux-grid.test.ts with layout verification tests
tasks.report: Created tests/tmux-grid.test.ts with 7 tests covering 1-4 pane configs, 2x2 verification, and regression test for 1+3 stacked bug.

tasks.name: Create scripts/preview-multi.ts that runs mock prompts with claude-3-5-haiku-latest and configurable thread count
tasks.report: Created scripts/preview-multi.ts with configurable thread count (1-8), mock prompts, and grid layout testing using claude-3-5-haiku-latest

tasks.name: Create scripts/preview-grid.ts as standalone 2x2 grid tester with simple commands
tasks.report: Created scripts/preview-grid.ts as standalone 2x2 grid tester with labeled panes showing their positions for visual verification

tasks.name: Create scripts/preview-fix.ts to test fix command retry flow with mock failed thread
tasks.report: Created scripts/preview-fix.ts to test fix command retry flow with mock failed thread, session tracking, and cleanup functionality

tasks.name: Add scripts/README.md with instructions for running preview scripts
tasks.report: Added comprehensive scripts/README.md with detailed instructions, usage examples, troubleshooting tips, and development workflow for all preview scripts

tasks.name: Add tests for createSession and addWindow in tmux.test.ts
tasks.report: Added tests for createSession and addWindow in tmux.test.ts using actual tmux commands.

tasks.name: Add tests for splitWindow and createGridLayout operations
tasks.report: Added tests for splitWindow and createGridLayout with layout verification.

tasks.name: Add tests for getSessionPaneStatuses and waitForAllPanesExit
tasks.report: Added tests for getSessionPaneStatuses and waitForAllPanesExit verifying status detection and timeouts.

tasks.name: Add tests for respawnPane and ensure cleanup in test teardown
tasks.report: Added tests for respawnPane and ensured cleanup using afterEach hook.

tasks.name: Verify 80%+ coverage of tmux.ts functions
tasks.report: Verified coverage of tmux.ts is 86.49% functions and 91.80% lines.

tasks.name: Refactor fix --retry to create a new tmux session (work-fix-{threadId}) instead of running opencode directly
tasks.report: Added getFixSessionName helper and tmux imports to fix.ts. Refactored executeRetry to create tmux session work-fix-{threadId} by default.

tasks.name: Run opencode command within the tmux session and attach user to it
tasks.report: executeRetry now creates tmux session with createSession(), sets remain-on-exit option, and attaches user using attachSession().

tasks.name: Handle detach (Ctrl-B D) to let process continue in background with reattach instructions
tasks.report: Added detach handling with clear console output showing session name and reattach instructions. Process continues in background on detach.

tasks.name: Update --resume to work within tmux if a fix session exists
tasks.report: Updated executeResume to check for existing fix tmux session and reattach to it if found. Also supports creating new tmux session for resume.

tasks.name: Add --no-tmux flag to preserve old foreground behavior
tasks.report: Added --no-tmux flag to FixCliArgs interface, parseCliArgs, and printHelp. Both executeRetry and executeResume now accept noTmux parameter.

tasks.name: Add fix command tmux integration tests to fix.test.ts
tasks.report: Added 7 tmux integration tests to fix.test.ts covering session creation, naming, remain-on-exit option, existing session detection, and multiple session coexistence.

tasks.name: Create notification system configuration guide in docs/
tasks.report: Completed documentation for notifications, threads schema, and fix command. Created example config and updated CLI help text.

tasks.name: Document threads.json schema and migration guide
tasks.report: Completed documentation for notifications, threads schema, and fix command. Created example config and updated CLI help text.

tasks.name: Document fix command tmux integration and new flags
tasks.report: Completed documentation for notifications, threads schema, and fix command. Created example config and updated CLI help text.

tasks.name: Create ~/.config/agenv/notifications.json.example with custom sounds and webhook examples
tasks.report: Completed documentation for notifications, threads schema, and fix command. Created example config and updated CLI help text.

tasks.name: Update CLI help text for --silent and --no-tmux flags
tasks.report: Completed documentation for notifications, threads schema, and fix command. Created example config and updated CLI help text.

tasks.name: Add console warning when reading sessions from deprecated tasks.json location
tasks.report: Added deprecation warnings for tasks.json sessions, updated Task interface with @deprecated annotations, cleaned up migration code, and verified tests.

tasks.name: Add @deprecated JSDoc annotations to old session fields in Task interface
tasks.report: Added deprecation warnings for tasks.json sessions, updated Task interface with @deprecated annotations, cleaned up migration code, and verified tests.

tasks.name: Clean up any temporary migration code paths
tasks.report: Added deprecation warnings for tasks.json sessions, updated Task interface with @deprecated annotations, cleaned up migration code, and verified tests.

tasks.name: Run full test suite (bun run test) and typecheck (bun run typecheck) to verify no regressions
tasks.report: Added deprecation warnings for tasks.json sessions, updated Task interface with @deprecated annotations, cleaned up migration code, and verified tests.
